example.name: autogen1
example.text: Most forecasters , including those in the Congressional Budget Office , assume inflation will be in excess of 4 % in each of those five years .
example.arg: inflation will be in excess of 4 % in each of those five years

example.text: some forecasters to anticipate the start of a new recession perhaps before year 's end
